data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Tanga, Tanzania to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tanga, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 224,761 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,820,439 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 224,761 believers in Tanga, Tanzania a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Tanga, Tanzania to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Dhaiso people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, purify the 224,761 believers in the state of Tanga to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Tanga to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, please give the church in the state of Tanga prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
